name: Chromatize
description:
Chromatize is a mini game where you the player need to collect blobs that are the same colour as you.

You can change your colour by left clicking.

Hearts will randomly appear in the map; collect them to gain health.

Use A & D to move left to right and press RIGHT CLICK  to dash in a direction.

Your dash has a cooldown so notice the dash icon in the top left. If its grey it means its on cooldown and if its coloured then its ready to use.

Every blob you collect will give you a point.

If you need further instruction press the question mark on the main menu.

Try to beat my record of 22 :)
